title: The US and Europe have finally reconnected, but they're moving in different directions on Covid-19
content:
1. The US and Europe have finally reconnected, but they're moving in different directions on Covid-19  CNN
  2. Despite reopening, the US is still closed to many in world  KSL.com
  3. SoCal woman reunites with her boyfriend after nearly 2 years as COVID travel restrictions lifted  KABC-TV
  4. Families share tearful reunions as U.S. ends international travel ban  Washington Post
  5. Photos: Loved ones reunite as U.S. reopens to international travelers  NPR
contentSnippet:
The US and Europe have finally reconnected, but they're moving in different directions on Covid-19  CNN
Despite reopening, the US is still closed to many in world  KSL.com
SoCal woman reunites with her boyfriend after nearly 2 years as COVID travel restrictions lifted  KABC-TV
Families share tearful reunions as U.S. ends international travel ban  Washington Post
Photos: Loved ones reunite as U.S. reopens to international travelers  NPR

localize.title: 米国と欧州はようやく再会したが、Covid-19では異なる方向に進んでいる
美国和欧洲终于重新联系起来，但它们在Covid-19上的方向不同
美國和歐洲終於重新聯繫起來，但它們在Covid-19上的方向不同
